product_name: Patagonia Better Sweater Icelandic Hoodie Jacket - Women's
long_description: A classy hoodie for everyday comfort, the women's Patagonia Better Sweater Icelandic hoodie jacket features an Icelandic-inspired pattern on its yoke and warm hood lined with brushed fabric. Sweater-knit weave and heathered, overdyed yarns offer an eye-pleasing look. Side panels with forward seams provide a nice fit through the body. Cool-weather comforts include a full-length zipper with garage and internal windflap. Stand-up collar is built into the three-panel hood. Smooth polyester jersey trims the hood, wind flap, pocket openings, cuffs and hem. Zippered handwarmers and a zippered pocket on the left sleeve keep your necessities secure. Styling details at cuffs and waistband. The women's Patagonia Better Sweater Icelandic hoodie jacket has a regular fit.
short_description: A classy hoodie for everyday comfort, the women's Patagonia Better Sweater Icelandic hoodie jacket features an Icelandic-inspired pattern on its yoke and warm hood lined with brushed fabric.
